campaignevents-rest-event-not-found: Adeyɛ biara nni hɔ a ɛwɔ saa ID yi.
campaignevents-rest-enable-registration-: Wɔmma wo kwan sɛ wobɛma dwumadi ntwerɛ din ayɛ adwuma.
campaignevents-rest-edit-page-nonlocal: Saa dwumadi yi dintwerɛ ɛyɛ adwuma wɔ wiki a edidi so yi na yɛ nsakraɛ nso wɔ hɔ:$1
campaignevents-rest-delete-already-delet: Wɔapopa dwumadi yi ho dintwerɛ dedaw.
campaignevents-rest-user-not-found: Obiara nni hɔ a ɔwɔ ahyɛnsodi yi a ɛdi akotene.
campaignevents-rest-remove-participants-: Parameter 'user_ids' no ɛsɛ sɛ ɛyɛ array a ɛwɔ ɔdeɛfoɔ IDs, anaasɛ null (de popa ɔdeɛfoɔ nyinaa).
campaignevents-rest-list-participants-em: "Deɛ wɔde yɛɛ username hwehwɛbea no, sɛ wɔkyerɛ no a, ɛsɛ sɛ ɛyɛ nsɛmma a ɛnnyɛ dane."
campaignevents-rest-list-participants-ca: "Wo nni ho abodin sɛ wobehu wɔn a wɔkyerɛw wɔn ho prɛvate ama saa ɛyɛ yi."
campaignevents-rest-set-organizers-empty: “<var>organizer_usernames</var>” ɛsɛ sɛ ɛyɛ ɔtare a ɛwɔ abɔdin na ɛntumi nyɛ hɔ nko.
campaignevents-rest-get-registration-inf: Wo mmfa wo ho nka saa asɛm yi.
campaignevents-rest-register-invalid-ans: Mmuaeɛ a ɛmfata a wɔde ma asɛmbisa $1
campaignevents-rest-register-for-event-n: "Mepa wo kyɛw, wie w'abakɔsɛm akyerɛwtohɔ wɔ $1, wiki a wɔbɔɔ abakɔsɛm no so."
campaignevents-rest-delete-event-nonloca: "Mepa wo kyɛw, yi w’abakɔsɛm akyerɛwtohɔ afi $1, wiki a wɔbɔɔ abakɔsɛm no so."
campaignevents-rest-email-participants-n: "Mepa wo kyɛw, fa email soma kɔma wɔn a wɔkyerɛw wɔn ho wɔ $1, wiki a wɔbɔɔ ɛyɛ no ho."
